Description: Ostracon, fragment of the body of a pale-red pottery vessel, the fabric is partially light-brown and grey in section the interior is lightly covered with a grey-brown granular deposit, the exterior is slightly ribbed and covered with a light-brown slip and faint traces of two lines of Coptic text written in black ink.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (394414) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/394414)
